title: Apple's New Macbook Pros, the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro, and more!
description:
Techtober is in full swing! This week Marques and Andrew go over the new gadgets from the Apple event. They discuss the new AirPods, the new M1 Pro and M1 Max chips, and of course the new Macbook Pros. After that, they go over the Google event and give their impressions on the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro before switching it up and talking about the Microsoft Surface Duo 2 and the Rivian R1T. Is October over yet?

Watch on YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/c/Waveform/featured
